comments:
The new keybinding (Alt+Enter) for java breakpoint properties is active in the breakpoints view all the time, and if used on a non-java breakpoint produces the following error:

To reproduce:

1. create a non-java breakpoint (I used an ant breakpoint :) )
2. select it in the breakpoints view and press Alt+Enter

Expected: nothing will happen as there are no properties for an ant breakpoint

Happens: it tries (and fails) to open the properties page

I alos found that once you activate the page once on a java breakpoint say bp1, and then select something like a breakpoint group and press alt+enter, you get the property page for bp1.

It seems that the breakpoint associated with the command is not etting nulled out when the selection is not an IJavaBreakpoint

Created an attachment (id=70513)
patch

fixes the issue with a simple null check and nulling out the cached breakpoint for the handler when and IJavaBreakpoint is not selected
released to HEAD, still waiting on 3.3.1 instructions
